title: Overview
subtitle: High-level snapshot of your payment activity.

totalPayments.helpText: All payments created via the simulator.

pending.label: Pending
pending.helpText: Payments that are still waiting for confirmation.

failed.helpText: Payments that could not be completed.

volume.label: Payment volume
volume.helpText: Total payment amount across all providers.

byProvider.title: Volume by provider

byCurrency.title: Volume by currency

recent.title: Recent payments
recent.empty: No recent payments. Create a new payment from the Payments page.
